level.text: An applicant for a license shall pay, in addition to the applicable license fee, the sum of one hundred dollars ($100.00) into the Fund.
Upon renewal of a license the licensee shall pay, in addition to the applicable renewal fee, the sum of one hundred dollars ($100.00) into the Fund.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 40 DCR 8480 (December 10, 1993); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5846 (July 21, 2006).
